props.body:
The Dynamic Machines Challenge, was a 3D render competition, where each contestant contributed a 10 second segment video to collectively create one giant marble machine. My entry was cave themed, more specifically, a crystal cave. I sketched designs on paper, and on my iPad, then created and modelled the assets in blender and substance 3D painter. Although I wasn't one of the winners, the project help me develop and become confident in my 3D workflow, which then I was able to apply to my later projects like the Intro for The Lion's Roar.
